div.h3: Updates from PC Alum & Nashville Recording Artist – Josh Gallagher

img.alt: Meal Program for Children to begin Friday 3/20/20

p.strong: Penn Cambria SD will offer a free bagged meals “to-go” for any child in our district between the ages of 2-18.

div.p: Meals will be available at the back circle of Penn Cambria High School in Cresson on Mondays and Thursdays. Each child will receive breakfast and lunches for multiple days.

a.title: PCCD School Safety and Security Grant Award

div.a: PCCD School Safety and Security Grant Award

div.div: We are pleased to announce that Penn Cambria School District has been awarded a $202,124 School Safety and Security Grant from the Pennsylvania Commission on Crime and Delinquency. You can read more about how this grant award will impact our...

a.title: Military Student Identifier (pdf)

a.title: Student Registration for Penn Cambria School District

div.a: Student Registration for Penn Cambria School District

div.div: Central Registration for Penn Cambria School District is located at the Administrative Office 201 6th Street Cresson, PA. To register your child, you may stop by between the hours of 7:30 a.m. and 3:00 p.m. (Monday - Friday). Call 814-886-8121...

div.div: K-12 Voluntary Student Accident Insurance

a.title: Due to increased congestion in the area, Cresson Borough will be strictly enforcing the No Parking restrictions along 4th street adjacent to the stadium both during athletic events and during the school day.

div.a: Due to increased congestion in the area, Cresson Borough will be strictly enforcing the No Parking restrictions along 4th street adjacent to the stadium both during athletic events and during the school day.

div.div: We remind our students, community members and fans that to avoid the fines associated with illegal parking along 4th Street please park elsewhere during school hours and at after-school events utilizing the stadium and auditorium.

div.p: The Penn Cambria School District will prepare productive citizens in a safe and positive environment that promotes excellence in academics, the arts and athletics.
